name: Mano Strange | Unleash the magic with your hands
name_original: Mano Strange | Unleash the magic with your hands
description:
With Mano  Strange, you can feel in the first person what it feels like being Doctor Strange and unleash magic spells out of your hands, thanks to technology and spell working.

This is an entry for ManoMotion SDK PRO Game-Jam May 2021, done by Abraham Georgiadis (https://www.visualabra.com/) and Bruno Moya (https://brunomoya.com/)
